research_output.COMMENT: This is the full JSON output from the research agent. Paste the entire results.json content here. The preprocessor will automatically extract what it needs (synthesis, key_findings, sentiment). Below is a minimal example structure.

main_event_research.summary: Your main event research summary here...
key_findings: Key finding 1 from main event research
Key finding 2 from main event research
Key finding 3 from main event research

research_output.synthesis: This is the overall synthesis narrative that combines all research into a coherent story. The preprocessor uses this as the primary research_summary because it is the most complete single-field representation of the research. It merges main event findings, sub-event findings, and their relationships.
research_output.disclaimer: This research is for informational purposes only...

main_event.title: Will the U.S. strike Iran?
main_event.description: Resolves YES if US conducts drone, missile, or air strike on Iranian soil or official Iranian embassy/consulate

markets.title: U.S. strikes Iran today (Feb 21)
markets.description: Resolves YES if strike occurs before 11:59 PM ET Feb 21
